formalpara.title: Internal help for this function in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen:
-= Info about function 'IFMODULE' =-
[Syntax] IFMODULE(<modulename.so>)
[Synopsis] Checks if an Asterisk module is loaded in memory
[Description] Checks if a module is loaded. Use the full module name as shown by the list in "module list". Returns "1" if module exists in memory, otherwise "0".

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:
